data.title: Structured Cabling
data.meta_description: Hyperion Networks is your trusted source for all of your structured cabling and business communications needs. We offer a one source solution for all cabling types. Our expert installers have the ability and experience to help you with the design and installation of your Data, Voice, and Audio/Video wiring. In addition to cable installations, Hyperion also provides sales, installation and service of business and enterprise class phone systems and VoIP phone solutions.
data.text:
Hyperion Networks is your trusted source for all of your structured cabling and business communications needs. We offer a one source solution for all cabling types. Our expert installers have the ability and experience to help you with the design and installation of your Data, Voice, and Audio/Video wiring. In addition to cable installations, Hyperion also provides sales, installation and service of business and enterprise class phone systems and VoIP phone solutions.

Structured cabling is the integral wiring network that is the veins of your company. This cabling network is critical to creating a seamless flow of information and IT service throughout your office. A flaw in your company’s structured cabling system can decrease efficiency and have a seriously negative impact on uptime and productivity.

Our Promise

We will work directly with you to develop a plan for your business’s structured cabling needs. Your customized structured cabling solution will take into account the specifics of your office space, business type, and opportunities for growth, all while staying within your budget. We will never try to up-sell you on structured cabling services that you don’t need. We will work with you to ensure that you, your employees, and your budget are happy with the end result.

Friendly, On Time & On Budget

Get your job done right and stay within budget. Hyperion offers a variety of cabling solutions including:

Get Started Today

Have questions about your network installation? We would love to hear about your project goals and requirements and are happy to provide a free site survey or answer any questions you may have.
